name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Basic principles of aerodynamics and fluid flow.

lessons.name: Forces on an Aircraft
lessons.description: Understanding lift, drag, and other forces acting on an aircraft.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Characteristics and behavior of subsonic airflows.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Understanding supersonic aerodynamics and shock waves.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding conduction, convection, and radiation.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Materials and techniques for thermal protection in spacecraft.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Materials used in spacecraft design and their properties.

lessons.name: Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding loads and stresses in spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Keplerâ€™s Laws
lessons.description: Fundamentals of planetary motion and orbits.

lessons.name: Orbit Determination
lessons.description: Techniques for determining spacecraft orbits.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Understanding spacecraft power generation and storage.

lessons.name: Thermal Control Systems
lessons.description: Techniques for managing spacecraft thermal environments.

name: Structure and Bonding
description: Introduction to the principles of chemical structure and bonding.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure
lessons.description: The structure of atoms and the periodic table.

lessons.name: Chemical Bonding
lessons.description: The nature of chemical bonds and molecular structure.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: Study of the structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Structure and properties of hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Classification and reactivity of organic functional groups.

name: Organic Synthesis
description: Principles and techniques of organic compound synthesis.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding organic reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Synthetic Strategies
lessons.description: Planning and executing organic synthesis routes.

name: Inorganic Structures
description: Study of the structures and properties of inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Coordination Chemistry
lessons.description: Structure and bonding in coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Metal Complexes
lessons.description: Properties and reactivity of metal complexes.

name: Inorganic Reactions
description: Study of the reactions and mechanisms of inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Redox Reactions
lessons.description: Oxidation-reduction reactions in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Ligand Substitution
lessons.description: Mechanisms of ligand substitution in metal complexes.

name: Inorganic Spectroscopy
description: Introduction to spectroscopic methods in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: UV-Vis Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Principles and applications of UV-Vis spectroscopy.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy in inorganic chemistry.

name: Thermodynamics in Chemistry
description: Fundamentals of thermodynamics, including laws, entropy, and free energy.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Understanding the first, second, and third laws of thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Gibbs Free Energy and Spontaneity
lessons.description: Exploring Gibbs free energy and its role in predicting reaction spontaneity.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates, mechanisms, and factors affecting kinetics.

lessons.name: Rate Laws and Reaction Order
lessons.description: Determining rate laws and understanding reaction order.

lessons.name: Catalysis and Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Exploring catalysts and stepwise reaction mechanisms.

name: Quantum Chemistry and Spectroscopy
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and spectroscopic techniques.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of quantum mechanics, including wave-particle duality.

lessons.name: Molecular Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Overview of spectroscopic techniques used in physical chemistry.

name: Elvish Languages: Sindarin and Quenya
description: An in-depth study of the two major Elvish languages, their grammar, phonetics, and usage.

lessons.name: Phonetics and Grammar of Quenya
lessons.description: Understanding the structure, phonetics, and grammatical rules of Quenya.

lessons.name: Sindarin Syntax and Writing System
lessons.description: Exploring the syntax, Tengwar script, and linguistic evolution of Sindarin.

name: Dwarvish and Runes of Khuzdul
description: Examining the secretive language of the Dwarves and their unique Cirth rune system.

lessons.name: Structure and Vocabulary of Khuzdul
lessons.description: Analyzing the linguistic patterns and preserved vocabulary of the Dwarvish language.

lessons.name: The Cirth Runes and Their Usage
lessons.description: Studying the origins, variations, and applications of the Cirth runic script.

name: The Black Speech and Other Tongues of Middle-earth
description: A study of the languages used by Sauron and other inhabitants of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Examining the harsh phonetics and limited vocabulary of Sauron's language.

lessons.name: Lesser-Known Languages of Middle-earth
lessons.description: An overview of languages such as Westron, Rohirric, and Entish.

name: Historical Alliances and Treaties
description: An exploration of the key alliances and peace agreements between Middle-earth's races.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
lessons.description: A detailed study of the alliance that sought to overthrow Sauron at the end of the Second Age.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond and the Fellowship
lessons.description: Analyzing the diplomatic discussions that led to the formation of the Fellowship of the Ring.

name: Conflicts and Power Struggles
description: Examining major conflicts and power struggles that shaped inter-species relations in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The War of the Dwarves and Orcs
lessons.description: Understanding the causes and consequences of the long-standing conflict between Dwarves and Orcs.

lessons.name: The Tension Between Elves and Dwarves
lessons.description: Exploring the historical mistrust and occasional cooperation between these two races.

name: Leadership and Diplomacy in Middle-earth
description: A study of key figures and their roles in diplomacy and governance across different races.

lessons.name: Gandalf the Mediator
lessons.description: Analyzing Gandalf's role in fostering cooperation among the Free Peoples of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Aragorn and the Reunification of Men
lessons.description: Examining Aragorn's diplomatic strategies in uniting Gondor and Rohan.
